channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @40PercentGerman Surely you mean an Alsterwasser‚Ä¶ oh, sorry, I thought this was the ‚Äústarting an argument‚Äù thread

Something came up and I had to rebook my flight to MN to be this Friday instead of next. Wife will join me next week. Hoping that no checked luggage and my new Gold status will help me through the European airport chaos.
@RealMarkDziak But they‚Äôd love the helicopter ride! (But seriously, why are connections like this even suggested?)
@ClaireSmith1848 Wow, what‚Äôs next? Political office? Our local SPD candidate says there should be more teachers in the Landtag! (She‚Äôs a teacher.)

Germany is great because you can put your 9 Euro ticket in an app on your phone, but your bus stop has no cell service so you can‚Äôt show the ticket to the bus driver
This really did happen to me. Apparently the HVV app needs to download monthly passes once a day. Good thing the bus driver was a sport about it. üòÖ
@Chillmost @HejM0 Good move! Unfortunately our airline (KLM) doesn‚Äôt offer it.
Aldi Nord has SBR this week for 3.29‚Ç¨, but my mom‚Äôs local grocery store in MN has it for 4 for $5.00! https://t.co/hjPAwnhwe9
@HejM0 Hope your plans weren‚Äôt disrupted!
‚ÄúBeware of Wolves‚Äù on my usual bike route. Ironically I saw a bunch of little wild pigs run into the woods near this spot last week. https://t.co/Ugm1b4bGnp
MLB subscription isn‚Äôt cheap, but watching the Twins on a Sunday evening (afternoon there) is Heimatgef√ºhl that‚Äôs worth it
@AaronGleeman @DanaWessel Metrodome effect? üòÇ
@40PercentGerman Leisure Suit Larry!
Hello, I‚Äôd like to speak to the DEI department. https://t.co/f4kywtMSLb
@HejM0 Middle seat. Fun times. Great way to get to know new people. üôÑ We now have 4 hour layover in AMS instead of 1, and they‚Äôve always let me in the EU line. üá™üá∫
@HejM0 We‚Äôre flying to the US on July 8 (which I now see is 2nd day of HH school vacation). We switched to the 6am flight to AMS. Maybe we should get to the airport the night before? ü§î
@cncx My mom has used the service and for her it was a godsend!
It‚Äôd be extremely sleazy if you don‚Äôt need it, but would ordering wheelchair service at the airport get you through security faster when the lines are hours long?
@transatlantic Dems are scared of playing dirty and always have been. That‚Äôs how we got here.
@OldTechAdverts @tehnyit We had a similar station wagon in the early ‚Äò80s, a Plymouth Volare. We called it ‚ÄúDas Boot‚Äù. ü§£
@tehnyit Thailand does have a lot of chicken products! https://t.co/ao99r5ZB96
@tehnyit Never heard of these. Is this Australia? Don‚Äôt see them on the McD Australia website.
You gotta fight for your right https://t.co/z5FWctND9n
@jenrazzle @HejM0 Hope seems like it was a century ago https://t.co/0RjLcGuIBf

This train wreck was over 10 years in the making, and the party that would have, could have, should have prevented it‚Ä¶ didn‚Äôt.
I decided a few years to let that party wander aimlessly without me (but they still have my vote) and joined a German party. I may not be able to vote here yet, but I helped pick party leaders and a Chancellor candidate who‚Äôs now in power.
And is checking off the boxes on their campaign promises, like just today on freedom of information for abortion providers https://t.co/lDiTROwiTX
Political involvement is also part business strategy. My wife belongs to the other main German party, but the left wing of the one party overlaps a lot with the right wing of the other. We then have a foot in the door of a lot of politicians where we can voice our concerns.
Or to do good. Through personal, media and political contacts, we were able to prevent an Afghan couple who work for us from deportation. They‚Äôve now become permanent residents. /Fin https://t.co/nR59In9Amk

@HejM0 @cdir @PurlTurtle I always thought it was Hamburg slang, but for a younger demographic so what do I know
@HejM0 @cdir @PurlTurtle ‚ÄòWie Berliner h√§ufig ‚ÄûAlter‚Äú sagen, benutzen Hamburger nun mal gerne ‚ÄûDigga‚Äú.‚Äô https://t.co/wY21zhhHD6
